Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Our product offers unparalleled features and benefits tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its exceptional quality and the unique advantages it provides, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This represents an outstanding opportunity to acquire a high-value asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
